body.raw:
{
    "recipent_type" : "toNumberInput", // Allowed: toNumberInput,toNumbersFromFileInput,toNumberGroupInput,
    "number": "1234567890", // Can be numbers seperated with comma ex: 1234454566, 1242323123. Required if recipent type is toNumberInput
    "schedule": "1", //Allowed 1(send now),2(send later),
    // "schedule_date" : "2023-04-30T18:06",
    "template_var_BODY" : ["1234"], // Can be null or array values
    "template_var_HEADER": null,
    "group_id" : null, // Array of group ids. Required if recipent_type is toNumberGroupInput
    "template_id": "233398695907903",// Required to send Business message,
    "whatsapp_phone_number_id": "103973902664895" // It is send device. Required to send message.
}

{
    "recipent_type" : "toNumberInput", // Allowed: toNumberInput,toNumbersFromFileInput,toNumberGroupInput,
    "number": "123456789", // Can be numbers seperated with comma ex: 1234454566, 1242323123. Required if recipent type is toNumberInput
    "schedule": "2", //Allowed 1(send now),2(send later),
    "schedule_date" : "2023-04-30T18:06",
    "template_var_BODY" : ["1234"], // Can be null or array values

    "template_id": "1232131231",// Required to send Business message,
    "whatsapp_phone_number_id": "123123" // It is send device. Required to send message.
}

    "email": ["test@sendeach.com"], // Required | Array of to email values
    "message": "SendEach Test message body content", // Required
    "subject": "SendEach Email Test",
